name: Wikipedia Search Functionality Test Plan
description: Testing the search functionality on Wikipedia for the term 'artificial intelligence' and verifying the accessibility and content of the resulting article.
requirements: 1. The search functionality works correctly. 2. Pressing Enter in the search box navigates directly to the article or search results. 3. The main article about AI is accessible. 4. The article contains expected sections like 'History', 'Applications', and 'Ethics'. 5. Navigation between sections works properly.

action_instruction.expected_outcome: User is directed to the Wikipedia homepage.

action_instruction.expected_outcome: Search box is visible and ready for input.

steps.description: Type 'artificial intelligence' in the search box

action_instruction.description: Type 'artificial intelligence' in the search box
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The text 'artificial intelligence' appears in the search box.

steps.description: Press Enter to submit the search

action_instruction.description: Press Enter to submit the search
action_instruction.expected_outcome: User is navigated to the search results page or directly to the article about artificial intelligence.

action_instruction.description: Verify the main article about artificial intelligence is accessible
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The article about artificial intelligence is displayed.

action_instruction.expected_outcome: The article contains sections titled 'History', 'Applications', and 'Ethics'.
